mapper.insert: insert into serial_no (order_id, serial_no, operation, status, gmt_create) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into serial_no
order_id,
serial_no,
operation,
status,
gmt_create,
